'''''ras''''' (plural '''rais''') is a [[Sindarin]] word meaning 'horn'.<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, ''ras''</ref>

==Examples==
* ''[[Caradhras]]'' - "Red-horn"
* ''[[Barad Nimras|Nimras]]'' - "White Horn"
* ''[[Ered Nimrais]]'' - "Mountains White", i.e. the White Mountains
